relevant_findings.GI: Soft abdomen with diffuse tenderness, most pronounced in the LLQ, active bowel sounds, well-healed colostomy scar
relevant_findings.rectal: Large area of erythema with multiple superficial abrasions, very tender to palpation

relevant_findings.general: Pleasant middle-aged man, sitting on side of bed, appears comfortable
relevant_findings.HEENT: AT/NC, EOMI, PERRL, anicteric sclera, pink conjunctiva, MMM
relevant_findings.heart: RRR, normal S1/S2, no murmurs, gallops, thrills, or rubs
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, obese, non-distended, LLQ tenderness on deep palpation, hyperactive bowel sounds
relevant_findings.rectal: External exam with diffuse erythema and erosions, significant tenderness
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm and well-perfused, no cyanosis, clubbing, or edema
relevant_findings.neurological: A&Ox3, moving all 4 extremities with purpose
